Type.Name: HTMLStreamWriteFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HTMLStreamWriteFunc(HTMLStream stream, string buffer, ulong size);
.class public auto ansi sealed HTMLStreamWriteFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate for use with . Meant to be used for writing the stream.
